examples.example: 我把这项重要的任务交给了最值得信赖的他。

translate.english: I entrusted this important task to the most trustworthy him.

examples.example: 我放心地把这项工作交给经验丰富的他去完成。

translate.english: I trustingly leave this work to the experienced him to finish.

examples.example: 我把精心准备的礼物交给亲爱的妈妈，看到她开心的笑容，我也觉得无比幸福。

translate.english: I gave the carefully prepared gift to my dear mother, and seeing her happy smile, I also felt extremely happy.
